channel.title: Help ME please!
channel.description: what the hell does it meen when i run my server and it says java is not recognized as an internal or external command?? Help me please!

item.title: Help ME please!
item.dc:creator: @D3f1l3d_1 D3f1l3d 1
item.description:
@D3f1l3d_1 wrote:

Well heres what i would do [left]1. Download Java 6u11 and JDK6u11[/left][left]2.Open my computer (start menu), view system information(left hand side) and click advanced[/left][left]3. Open up environmental variables and edit classpath and put C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\That’ll get part of your java going and edit path and put C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\binThis will let it use any Java 6[/left][left]Sit back and play. That should’ve tooken care of it. If theres any other problems let me know [/left]

Read full topic
